channel.title: So, ever use an AR2 Before?
channel.description: I've recently finished making a prop of the HL2 AR2. Originally this was being made for a fan film but it was put into storage when the project died, however I decided to quickly finnish it up for a convention I went to where I dressed up as a Rebel Medic. It's somewhat sloppy, but I would of added more detail to it if I wasn't on a time limit. ![](upload://6I6PuuEmauXO02up6hgyYXrei26.jpeg) ![](upload://6I6PuuEmauXO02up6hgyYXrei26.jpeg)

item.description:

OT: Nice job, looks the biz. How big is it, cos it looks a fair size in the pics.

item.title: So, ever use an AR2 Before?
item.dc:creator: AlbinoGlowStick
item.description:
I’ve recently finished making a prop of the HL2 AR2. Originally this was being made for a fan film but it was put into storage when the project died, however I decided to quickly finnish it up for a convention I went to where I dressed up as a Rebel Medic. It’s somewhat sloppy, but I would of added more detail to it if I wasn’t on a time limit.

Read full topic
item.source: So, ever use an AR2 Before?
